channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scientists: Doctors Give Kids ADHD Drugs For Adults’ Convenience
item.description: Clearly, schools are a bad environment for a heck of a lot of little boys, if one-quarter have to be medicated just to go there.
